Event.info: OSINT - Threat Advisory: Oh No Cleo! Cleo Software Actively Being Exploited in the Wild

Object.comment: CVE-2024-50623: Enriched via the cve_advanced module
Object.description: Vulnerability object describing a common vulnerability enumeration which can describe published, unpublished, under review or embargo vulnerability for software, equipments or hardware.
Object.name: vulnerability

Attribute.value: In Cleo Harmony before 5.8.0.20, VLTrader before 5.8.0.20, and LexiCom before 5.8.0.20, there is a JavaScript Injection vulnerability: unrestricted file upload and download could lead to remote code execution.

Object.description: An IP address (or domain or hostname) and a port seen as a tuple (or as a triple) in a specific time frame.
Object.name: ip-port

Object.comment: Detects Powershell spawned from Cleo software.  Evidence of unknown threat actor exploiting the CLEO tooling using this pattern observed in Dec 2024
Object.description: An object describing a Sigma rule (or a Sigma rule name).
Object.name: sigma

Attribute.value:
title: Possible Cleo MFT Exploitation 2024
id: f007b877-02e3-45b7-8501-1b78c2864029
status: experimental
description: Detects Powershell spawned from Cleo software.  Evidence of unknown threat actor exploiting the CLEO tooling using this pattern observed in Dec 2024.
author: Tanner Filip, Austin Worline, Chad Hudson, Matt Anderson
references: []
date: 2024/12/09
logsource:
    category: process_creation
    product: windows
detection:
    selection:
        ParentImage|endswith: '\javaw.exe'
        Image|endswith: '\cmd.exe'
        CommandLine|contains:
            - 'powershell'
            - ' -NonInteractive'
            - ' -noni '
            - ' -enc '
            - ' -EncodedCommand'
        ParentCommandLine|contains:
            - 'VLTrader'
            - 'lexicom'
            - 'Harmony'
            - 'VersaLex'

    condition: selection
falsepositives:
    - Unknown
level: high

Object.description: An object describing a Sigma rule (or a Sigma rule name).
Object.name: sigma

Attribute.value:
title: Javaw Spawning Suspicious Powershell Commands
id: a0ec945f-2328-40e9-96f6-27dadf72861b
status: experimental
description: Detects Javaw spawning suspicious powershell commands. This has been observed as possible post-exploitation activity of Cleo software.
author: Chad Hudson, Matt Anderson
references: []
date: 2024/12/09
logsource:
    category: process_creation
    product: windows
detection:
    selection:
        ParentImage|endswith:
            - '\javaw.exe'
        Image|endswith:
            - '\cmd.exe'
    cmdline:
        CommandLine|contains:
            - ' -nop'
            - ' -noni'
            - ' -NonInteractive'
            - ' -w hidden '
            - ' -windowstyle hidden*'
            - '(New-Object Net.WebClient).Download*'
            - ' -enc '
            - ' -EncodedCommand '
    powershell:
        CommandLine|contains: powershell
    condition: selection and cmdline and powershell
falsepositives:
    - Unknown
Detects Javaw spawning suspicious powershell commands. This has been observed as possible post-exploitation activity of Cleo software.
